original_title: Six Variations on the Same Theme: Fourth Variation
overview: Six Variations presents six silent short films, each with their own unique visual motif that abstracts, interferes with, and obfuscates an archival reel of Kodachrome home movies. The fourth variation presents the home movies that unite all six films overlaid on top of itself, creating new, dynamic images and colors.
title: Six Variations on the Same Theme: Fourth Variation
